item.title: VRT
item.description: score:59 Chances: Solid earnings estimate revisions indicate potential for share price growth. Stock included in Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy) growth stocks list. Positive momentum for stocks with recent bullish run. Strategic acquisitions expanding the business and contributing to revenues. Management’s positive guidance and strong year for the company.
